package.name: PPLSAY_Social_Discussions
package.summary: Bring to online retailers and their customers discussions from social networks about products offered online PPLSAY – what people say about products in social networks SaaS solution for online retail businesses of any size
package.description: PEOPLE SAY is innovative platform that connects your online store to crowd voice. Today, millions of consumers share real life product experiences on social networks. These tweets, posts, comments and discussions contain valuable information for online retailers and their customers. PEOPLE SAY brings online product discussions directly to your product pages. Our platform empowers your online customers by providing them with real life consumer experiences of products in your online store from around the globe. Online retailers use PEOPLE SAY to successfully increase conversion rates, enhance their customers purchasing experience, develop customer loyalty and improve their websites S.E.O. We invite online retailers to leverage our innovative platform to obtain the most up-to-date, fresh and unbiased discussions about thousands of products. No more need to collect or generate product reviews. Just install Free Beta version and enjoy immediate benefits. PPLSAY extension is super easy to install ( see installation notes) no further maintenance is required.
package.notes:
Main Features: * Enhanced discussions relevance scoring mechanism * Filtering , Sorting and Search - Discussions can be filtered by features or social network - Added sorting by relevance, date and popularity - Added free search on product discussions * Feedback - Discussion can be marked as helpful or not helpful by user * Highlighter - Highlights product name, search keyword * Pagination * Multiselct navigation for features and social network filters.
* Added support for Magento 1.5,1.6,1.9
